snippet: Abdulhadi al-Khawaja, a jailed activist who has been on a hunger strike for 58 days, was moved to a hospital and fed intravenously after his health deteriorated sharply, his lawyer said.
abstract: Abdulhadi al-Khawaja, jailed activist in Bahrain who has been on hunger strike for 58 days, is moved to hospital and fed intravenously after his health deteriorates sharply; protesters gather in capital Manama to demand Khawaja's release from prison.
lead_paragraph: Abdulhadi al-Khawaja, a jailed activist who has been on a hunger strike for 58 days, was moved to a hospital and fed intravenously after his health deteriorated sharply, his lawyer said.

headline.main: Bahrain: Hunger Striker Moved to Hospital as His Supporters Rally
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Hunger Striker Moved To Hospital as His Supporters Rally
